<div class="text-primary border-bottom p-2 mb-2 d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center">
<strong>Solution:</strong>
</div>
<div style="position: relative;z-index:1">
<fmath class="fm-inline"><msub><mi class="fm-mi-length-1" mathvariant="italic" style="padding-right: 0.44ex;">H</mi><span class="fm-script fm-inline" style="vertical-align: -0.5em;"><mn>0</mn></span></msub></fmath> will be the plane containing the line <fmath class="fm-inline"><msub><mi class="fm-mi-length-1" mathvariant="italic">ℓ</mi><span class="fm-script fm-inline" style="vertical-align: -0.5em;"><mn>1</mn></span></msub></fmath> and parallel to <fmath class="fm-inline"><msub><mi class="fm-mi-length-1" mathvariant="italic">ℓ</mi><span class="fm-script fm-inline" style="vertical-align: -0.5em;"><mn>2</mn></span></msub></fmath>. <br> <br> <fmath class="fm-inline"><mo>∴</mo></fmath> Normal vector of plane parallel <fmath class="fm-inline"><msub><mi class="fm-mi-length-1" mathvariant="italic">ℓ</mi><span class="fm-script fm-inline" style="vertical-align: -0.5em;"><mn>1</mn></span></msub></fmath> and <fmath class="fm-inline"><msub><mi class="fm-mi-length-1" mathvariant="italic">ℓ</mi><span class="fm-script fm-inline" style="vertical-align: -0.5em;"><mn>2</mn></span></msub></fmath> is <div class="hscrollenable"><fmath class="fm-inline"><mrow><mrow><mo class="fm-mo-Luc" style="font-size: 4.758em; vertical-align: -0.197em; display: inline-block; transform: scaleX(0.5);">|</mo><span class="fm-vert" mtagname="mtable"><table><tbody><tr class="fm-mtr" mtagname="mtr"><td class="fm-mtd" mtagname="mtd"><span mtagname="mover" style="vertical-align: 0.35em;"><span class="fm-vert"><table><tbody><tr><td><mo style="display: block; margin-top: 0em; margin-bottom: -0.5em;">^</mo></td></tr><tr><td class="fm-underover-base"><mi class="fm-mi-length-1" mathvariant="italic">i</mi></td></tr></tbody></table></span></span></td><td class="fm-mtd" mtagname="mtd"><span mtagname="mover" style="vertical-align: 0.35em;"><span <span class="h5">Let <fmath class="fm-inline"><mi class="fm-mi-length-1" mathvariant="italic">z</mi></fmath> be a complex number satisfying <fmath class="fm-inline"><mrow><mrow><mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mo class="fm-mo-Luc">|</mo><mi class="fm-mi-length-1" mathvariant="italic">z</mi><mo class="fm-mo-Luc">|</mo></mrow><span class="fm-script fm-inline" style="vertical-align: 0.7em;"><mn>3</mn></span></msup><mo class="fm-infix">+</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mi class="fm-mi-length-1" mathvariant="italic">z</mi><span class="fm-script fm-inline" style="vertical-align: 0.7em;"><mn>2</mn></span></msup></mrow></mrow><mo class="fm-infix">+</mo><mrow class="ma-repel-adj"><mrow class="ma-repel-adj"><mn>4</mn><mspace style="margin-right: 0.17em; padding-right: 0.001em; visibility: hidden;" width=".17em">&zwnj;</mspace><mi class="ma-repel-adj" mathvariant="normal">bar</mi></mrow><mspace style="margin-right: 0.17em; padding-right: 0.001em; visibility: hidden;" width=".17em">&zwnj;</mspace><mi class="fm-mi-length-1" mathvariant="italic">z</mi></mrow></mrow><mo class="fm-infix">−</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow><mo class="fm-infix-loose">=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></fmath>, where <fmath class="fm-inline"><mrow class="ma-repel-adj"><mi class="ma-repel-adj" mathvariant="normal">bar</mi><mspace style="margin-right: 0.17em; padding-right: 0.001em; visibility: hidden;" width=".17em">&zwnj;</mspace><mi class="fm-mi-length-1" mathvariant="italic">z</mi></mrow></fmath> denotes the complex conjugate of <fmath class="fm-inline"><mi class="fm-mi-length-1" mathvariant="italic">z</mi></fmath>. Let the imaginary part of <fmath class="fm-inline"><mi class="fm-mi-length-1" mathvariant="italic">z</mi></fmath> be nonzero. Match each entry in List-I to the correct entries in List-II. <br> <div class="hscrollenable"><img src="https://www.topcoaching.in/ckeditor/plugins/imageuploader/uploads/24_03_14_65f2bf9f9515f.png" data-filename="1.png" style="width: 320px;"><br> </div>The correct option is<br></span>
</div></div>

                                                                                                                            <h6 class="langdata1"><style>.fm-math,fmath{font-family:STIXGeneral,'DejaVu
